article.title: Northrop Grumman Receives Contract to Provide Electronic Combat Systems for Republic of Korea Aircraft
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Northrop Grumman Corporation has won a $74.6 million contract to provide 21 ALQ-135M electronic combat systems for the Republic of Korea Air Force's F-15K aircraft. The AN/ALQ-135M is a fully automatic, internally-mounted electronic combat system that prioritizes, manages and defeats multiple threats simultaneously.
